/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. 

In the middle of the street, a large tree stands tall, its branches reaching out towards the sky, providing a touch of nature amidst the cityscape. The street itself is lined with trees, their leaves forming a green canopy over the road. 

On the right side of the street, a body of water glistens under the sunlight, its surface reflecting the surrounding buildings and trees. The water body adds a serene element to the bustling city environment. 

The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered here and there, adding depth to the expansive sky. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of urban development and natural elements in Beijing.
